column8: a man was drunk (*or possibly under the influence of drugs) and took a knife
column12: is a construction worker living in the area.------Before the incident
column13: the man had ‘studied dark magic’ (*?) and regularly drank.  Using a knife to cut his own genitals
column14: he startled neighbors and law enforcement who arrived at the scene to help
column15: but the influence of alcohol led the victim to pull the knife at them.------Police managed to overpower him and called an ambulance to take him to hospital. ------POST NEWS
